attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To build a large structure resembling that of one of the most magnificent cathedrals built by not only the church but by Briton itself to encourage others to convert to Christianity if and only if the mosque in London is built, as this is only fair for equal rights. this must also be built in the centre of london.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
